scripts.deploy: gcloud builds submit --tag us-docker.pkg.dev/valoriyan/kupo-docker-repo/kupo-beta-ai-embedding-generator-service:latest --project valoriyan && gcloud run deploy kupo-beta-ai-embedding-generator-service --project valoriyan --region us-central1 --image us-docker.pkg.dev/valoriyan/kupo-docker-repo/kupo-beta-ai-embedding-generator-service:latest
scripts.build_local_docker: docker build -t kupo/embedding_generator_service . && docker run -it kupo/embedding_generator_service bash
